subject: [Radiance-general] Canada's building performance simulationconference - eSim 2014, Ottawa, Canada - Call for Abstracts
body:
Dear Colleagues,

It's my pleasure to continue the legacy of Canada's building performance
simulation conference, /eSim/. Historically, eSim has hosted hundreds of
building simulation experts from Canada and around the world.

eSim 2014 will occur at Carleton University in Ottawa on May 8 and 9,
2014 with workshops on the day before and after. The online submission
system is now live (esim.ca) and *250 word abstracts are due by Sept.
27, 2013*.

I look forward to your submissions and welcome you in advance to Ottawa
at eSim 2014.

Liam O'Brien,
Chair, /eSim 2014/, Ottawa, Canada

--
William (Liam) O'Brien, PhD
Assistant Professor, Architectural Conservation and Sustainability Engineering
Carleton University
Canal Building, 5208
(613) 520-2600 ext. 8037
http://humanbuildinginteractionlab.wordpress.com/
